channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
i got everything just about to work right when this happends...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at PlayerHandler.loadAllClans(PlayerHandler.java:14) at PlayerHandler.<init>(PlayerHandler.java:278) at Server.main(Server.java:37)

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

[quote=“johnl17, post:2, topic:422856”][quote author=Army123 link=topic=525510.msg3825995#msg3825995 date=1322187773]
i got everything just about to work right when this happends…

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NullPointerException
at PlayerHandler.loadAllClans(PlayerHandler.java:14)
at PlayerHandler.(PlayerHandler.java:278)
at Server.main(Server.java:37)

[/quote]

Explain?[/quote]

ok. the error occurs in the source file i downloaded… not the client file…
the client file runs just fine and pops up the client screen but it cant connect to server. so i needed to also run my source client in order for the actually client to work. but than that error poped up… and i cant seem to find the location of the errror and change it… or what to change it to…

Read full topic
